events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position successfully.
The application has been categorized under the engineering department based on the candidate's skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process efficiently.
The candidate has completed the initial screening successfully, demonstrating a solid understanding of key software engineering concepts.
Candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening outcome and expressed enthusiasm for the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate for the upcoming Thursday at 2 PM UTC.
The candidate completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving ability and coding skills.
Following a successful technical round, the HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
The HR interview was conducted successfully; the candidate exhibited enthusiasm and alignment with company values.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including competitive compensation and attractive benefits package.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed strong interest in joining the engineering team.
The candidate has formally accepted the job offer and is excited to start the new role as a software engineer.
The onboarding process has started, including account setup, initial training schedules, and team introductions.
The hiring process has been successfully closed and the candidate has fully joined the engineering team.
